panels.title: 工場全体の計画保全進捗率 | Progress of the whole facatory

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  process_name AS 工程, 
  CAST(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT
  ) / COUNT(status) * 100 AS 完了率（％）
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '') and site_name = '${SiteName}'and $__timeFilter(due_date) 
GROUP BY
  process_name

panels.title: ライン別の進捗率 | Progress Rate by Line(s)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  process_name AS "設備 | Machines",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "1月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "2月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "3月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "4月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "5月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "6月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "7月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "8月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "9月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "10月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "11月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "12月"
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM due_date) = 2025  -- 例: 2025
GROUP BY
  process_name
ORDER BY
  process_name;

panels.title: 年間進捗率（工程） | Annual Progress Rate by processes
選択工程における計画保全進捗率 | Progress of the selected process

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "完了件数",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "未完了件数"
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND process_name = '${ProcessName}' 
  AND $__timeFilter(due_date)

panels.title: 残件（今月） |  Remaining Cases of this month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  machine_name AS 設備, 
  CAST(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT
  ) / COUNT(status) * 100 AS  完了率（％）
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  and site_name = '${SiteName}' and process_name = '${ProcessName}' AND $__timeFilter(due_date)
GROUP BY
  machine_name
ORDER BY
  machine_name ASC

panels.title: 設備別の完了率 | Progress Ratio by machines

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  machine_name AS 設備,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 完了件数,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 未完了件数
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND process_name = '${ProcessName}'
  AND $__timeFilter(due_date)
GROUP BY
  machine_name
ORDER BY
  machine_name ASC;

panels.title: 設備別の完了件数 | Progress Counts by machines

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  machine_name AS "設備 | Machines",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "1月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "2月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "3月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "4月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "5月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "6月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "7月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "8月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "9月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "10月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "11月",
  ROUND(
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 /
    NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2
  ) AS "12月"
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  and site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND process_name = '${ProcessName}'
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM due_date) = 2025  -- 例: 2025
GROUP BY
  machine_name
ORDER BY
  machine_name;

panels.title: 年間進捗率（設備） | Annual Progress Rate by machines

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  担当者,
  SUM(完了フラグ) AS 完了件数,
  SUM(未完了フラグ) AS 未完了件数
FROM (
  SELECT
    CASE 
      WHEN assignees_display_name IS NULL OR assignees_display_name = '' THEN '未割付'
      ELSE assignees_display_name
    END AS 担当者,
    CASE 
      WHEN status IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS 完了フラグ,
    CASE 
      WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS 未完了フラグ
  FROM
    scheduled_events
  WHERE
    NOT(machine_name = '')
    AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
    AND process_name = '${ProcessName}'
    AND $__timeFilter(due_date)
) AS sub
GROUP BY
  担当者
ORDER BY
  CASE 
    WHEN 担当者 = '未割付' THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END,
  担当者;

panels.title: 担当者別の進捗件数 | Progress Counts by assginees

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "1月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "2月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "3月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "4月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "5月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "6月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "7月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "8月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "9月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "10月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "11月",
    SUM(CASE WHEN status NOT IN ('Finished', 'FinalApprovementFinished', 'Requesting') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM due_date) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "12月"
FROM
  scheduled_events
WHERE
  not(machine_name = '')
  AND site_name = '${SiteName}' 
  AND process_name = '${ProcessName}' 
  AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM due_date) = 2025  -- 例: 2025

panels.title: 残件（工程別） |  Remaining Cases by processes
